channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives two strangers, Mike and Manaswi, the cash to buy, renovate and sell a Victorian house in Leicester. But can they get past restoring it and get on with renovation to flip it for a profit.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Martin Compston's Scottish Fling
channel.desc: Martin Compston and Phil MacHugh travel up the west coast of Scotland on an adventure to discover the different ways people experience the great Scottish outdoors.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Wartime Farm
channel.desc: The team tackle the conditions faced in 1940, in the face of rationing and the Blitz. 2/8.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Aylesbury to design a traditional courtyard garden with a Turkish twist to remind Elaine and Kevin of their time spent living abroad.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Stoke-on-Trent to design a safe and practical garden for Doris and her daughter Petra, inspired by the German meadows that surrounded Doris's childhood home.
